籤詩版本二:
Gudu, tare da toshe hatsarori da yawa, ɗaukar ruwa da jan mutane zuwa hawan tsaunuka
Har ma ina neman taimako a wata ƙasa, ban taɓa komawa bayan tafiyar dubban mil ba.
詩意:
Wannan hexagram yana kama da jan laka da ruwa.
Yana da kyau a kasance masu ra'ayin mazan jiya a komai.
解曰: Ja da baya yana yiwuwa. Ci gaba yana da wahala. Ku kasance masu ra'ayin mazan jiya. Kar ku yi tsammanin hawan sama.
籤詩故事一:
◇ Yana da wuya Qiuniang ya tashi
Du Qiu ɗan asalin Jinling ne a daular Tang.
Tana da shekaru 15, ta zama kuyangar Li Qi (maci amana a daular Tang).
A cikin shekara ta biyu ta Yuanhe (807), Li Qi ya kaddamar da rundunar 'yan tawaye a hukumance. Daga baya, tawayen Li Qi ya gaza, kuma an saka Du Qiu a cikin fadar. Daga baya, sarki Xianzong na Daular Tang ya sami tagomashi kuma ta zama kuyangi.
A shekara ta goma sha biyar ta sarautar Yuanhe (820), Tang Muzong ya hau karagar mulki ya nada ta a matsayin dansa Li Min's Fumu (wata yar mace wacce ta kware wajen kula da 'ya'yan gidan sarauta).
Daga baya, an tube Li Min a matsayin Sarkin Zhang, kuma Du Qiuci ya koma garinsu.
Da Du Mu ya wuce ta Jinling, sai ya ga matalauta da tsohuwa...
(Wannan labarin ya kasance misali ne na nadama cewa al'amura suna tabarbarewa kowane lokaci.)
聖意: Gida ba ya son kansa, addu’ar arziki, sa’a a kaka da damuna, aure lafiya, addu’ar albarkar Liujia, addu’ar albarka ga masu tafiya a kasa, toshe gonaki, tsutsotsin siliki, rashin lafiya ga dabbobi shida, wahalar samun mutane, shari’a. asarar sa'a ga ƙaura, asarar dukiya, rashin lafiya, da kaburbura a Fushan.
